website_summaries.verdict: If you or the child in your life have ever wanted a Slinky Dog toy just like the one in Toy Story, this is what you've been looking for.
pros: Ideal for ages 3 and up, this Slinky Dog toy features a slinky body just like the character in the movie, but is entirely covered in soft cloth, so he's huggable, too
Made to be durable enough to hold up to regular play and cuddling
cons: The toy measures 21" long, so this isn't ideal if you're looking for a smaller toy

customer_reviews.title: Stiching was an Issue
customer_reviews.text: This toy seemed like a great value, but the stitchng came loose in three places along the Slinky spring within two days. I returned the item and did not order another. It's possible this one was defective, and I can't say whether all would have the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: Chrislyn

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and on time, item purchased as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Basil A. McDougald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product complies with the description I recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big sure put a smile in my nieces face.
customer_reviews.author: Arlen

customer_reviews.title: Product as described. However did tear a little at ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. However did tear a little at the nose and tail, but still worth the money paid for and the wear and tear was expected when given to a two year old. Still durable and the slinky portion of the dog has withheld shape and spring. not to mention extremely large for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Rivera-Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best slinky dog ever and SO big and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the best slinky dog ever and SO big and soft. If your child likes toy story they will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my son's birthday since he loves dogs and Toy Story and I am so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: This slinky dog is HUGE, and only $15.99???? Wow! I ordered this for my son's birthday since he loves dogs and Toy Story and I am so happy I did. It is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Allen

customer_reviews.title: That it looks just like on the picture
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s huge. Looks really cute. Fast shipping. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Manuela S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole in the body and cardboard attachment sticking out. Returning isn’t an option, Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable!!!! Can hardly wait for Christmas to see his reaction to this great toy.
customer_reviews.author: farmluvr

customer_reviews.title: A Three-Year-Old's Delight
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do, don't get this for anyone under the age of three (or a big two-year-old). This Slinky Dog is ginormous and my three-year-old daughter is giddy with excitement over dragging him all through the house. This is a great cuddle-up toy and definitely different from the usual big, oversized plush toys. Oh, and the slinky part is well strong and resistant to being mangled by little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Odaniel

customer_reviews.title: Some toys are just too good for kids...
customer_reviews.text: ...and this is one of them. A huggable plush version of a classic Slinky toy is an inspired idea. There are no wheels on his feet, but one can easily imagine toddlers pulling his front legs forward, then pushing up the rear legs, over and over, to move him across the floor. Older children will enjoy draping him around their necks -- as will grown-ups. The ability to pose him in many positions means he'll "play well" with other toys. Or you can use his "spring belly" to hold small action figures prisoner. This is likely to be another "Tickle Me Elmo", in short supply at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: William Sommerwerck

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a neat toy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow this is a super neat toy. Pictures don't do it justice. This dog is HUGE in person. This toy has massive curb appeal. Not only will every child in the room immediately lock eyes on this toy, every adult will too. It's just one of those toys that immediately attracts attention. The playability is good but somewhat limited, however this is not the type of toy that gets stuffed away in the closet and forgotten about (it won't fit, for one thing). This is the type of toy that stays permanently on display in the playroom or kid's room because it just looks really neat. It's definitively the type of toy that you keep. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: TINETQL

customer_reviews.title: Does not even sit without falling
customer_reviews.text: Thought dog would open and close like slinky. It does not. Doesn't even sit by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: Soft and stretchy , this toy is just too cute. Based on the popular Toy Story character, he is about fifteen inches tall and stretches for a good 36 inches. He is sturdy enough to withstand enthusiastic little hands. Hand wash and dry flat. This is an adorable toy that with thrill dog lovers and Toy Story fans.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Really cool.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Really cool and lots of fun. My kids loved this. They have had so much fun playing with this. Giant is the correct word in the description of this.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for those who love toy story
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old and she loves it. Its really big and plush. The slinky part is soft too. Great toy for those who love toy story!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Serra

customer_reviews.title: Large, cute
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than I expected. It's pretty big. Of course my son loved it. He wanted to play with it right away. It was very soft. Toy Story is such a big hit, and this is a very recognizable character from it. As long as you are okay with the size, than it makes a nice gift. It looks just like the character from the movie.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Plush and BIG
customer_reviews.text: The slinky dog is a soft plush toy with the added bonus of retractable coils that make him stretch to 3 feet. It looks just like the dog featured in Toy Story (I think the original one was a wiener dog). It is pretty large - about 15 inches tall, but very cuddly and soft - perfect for a toddler to snuggle with.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vest

customer_reviews.title: Wow, He Is BIG...
customer_reviews.text: ..and that is grand! He is big, and soft and so lovable. I can not imagine a child that would not love this and have a new best pal to use his or her imagination playing with. Just take into consideration his size when buying and you will have one delighted child.
customer_reviews.author: cait

customer_reviews.title: It looks great it is huge and the gift wrapping is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my nephew. It looks great it is huge and the gift wrapping is awesome, it is definitely worth $3.50 to have Amazon gift wrap this for you. It comes in a huge bag that is reusable
customer_reviews.author: joshua

product_meta.title: Disney Pixar Toy Story Giant Slinky Dog Plush
product_meta.description: Disney Pixar Toy Story Giant Slinky Dog Plush is the big dog from the big screen! Fan-favorite character from the Toy Story franchise is now available as a giant huggable plush toy! Adorable and soft, he stretches out to a full three feet long, so there's more of him to love. Includes a 15 inch tall Slinky Dog plush with a fabric covered spring. Recommended for children 3 years of age and older.
feature_bullets: Disney Pixar Toy Story favorite character in a giant size
Includes a 15 inch tall Slinky Dog plush with a fabric covered spring
Recommended for children 3 years of age and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
